data.eml:eml: The arachnid order Schizomida in the Brazilian Atlantic Forest: a new species of Rowlandius and new records of Stenochrus portoricensis (Schizomida: Hubbardiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Adalberto J., Dias, Sidclay C., Brescovit, Antonio D., Santos, Pollyanna P. (2008): The arachnid order Schizomida in the Brazilian Atlantic Forest: a new species of Rowlandius and new records of Stenochrus portoricensis (Schizomida: Hubbardiidae). Zootaxa 1850: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183403
